Doxefazepam (nke a na-ere n'okpuru aha Doxans) bụ ọgwụ benzodiazepine Ọ nwere ihe na-eme ka nchegbu kwụsị, ihe na-egbochi nkụchi, sedative na ihe na-ehi ụra nke ọkpụkpụ

A na-eji ya agwọ ọrịa dị ka ọgwụ na-eme ka mmadụ na-ehi ụra. Dị ka Babbini na ndị ọrụ ibe ya si kwuo na ụdị nke ụwa na ụdị nke dị ka onye isi oche nke ọkụ na 1975, ihe a sitere na flurazepam dị n'etiti okpukpu abụọ na okpukpu anọ karịa nke ikpeazụ ma n'otu oge ahụ bụrụ ọkara dị ka nsị na anụmanụ ụlọ nyocha.

Akụkụ 5.5 nke isiokwu Doxefazepam na Mpịakọta 66 nke Òtù Ahụ Ike Ụwa (WHO) na International Agency for Research on Cancer's (IARC) IARC Monographs na nyocha nke ihe ize ndụ carcinogenic nye ụmụ mmadụ, isiokwu na-akọwa mmetụta carcinogenic / toxic nke doxefazefam na ụmụ mmadụ na ụmụ anụmanụ na-anwale, na-ekwu na enwere "ihe akaebe na-ezughị ezu n'ime ụmụ mmadụ maka carcinogenicity nke doxefefaze" na ọgwụ na-eme ka mmadụ ghara imebi.
